newsitem.title: ITALY: SOCCER-ITALY'S CESENA SACK COACH AFTER CUP LOSS.
newsitem.headline: SOCCER-ITALY'S CESENA SACK COACH AFTER CUP LOSS.

text.p: Italian second division Cesena sacked coach Marco Tardelli on Thursday a day after being eliminated from the Italian cup.
A club spokeswoman said Cesena's managers made the decision during a meeting following the club's third round 2-1 defeat at home by Cremonese on Wednesday.
She said a successor would be named in the next few days.
